title: I need a therapist after playing league today
body: I cannot comprehend how absolutely cancerous everyone is. And my idiot friends wonder why I can't get an account past level 30 without getting banned. Every single game all 4 of my team members feed, flame each other, run it down, or go AFK/leave the game, and I am expected to be okay with it. Oh yea sure I report all 4 teammates every game because of their actions but I think we all know what good that's going to do. I'm going to start submitting tickets for every single teammate I ever get because there's not one of them who's a decent human being.
